text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.G.DE38Anti-HCV laboratory-based immunoassay (recommended)Hepatitis C test type - Anti-HCV laboratory-based immunoassay (recommended)
    HIV.G.DE39Anti-HCV rapid diagnostic test (RDT)Hepatitis C test type - Anti-HCV rapid diagnostic test (RDT)
    HIV.G.DE40Dried blood spot (DBS) anti-HCV testHepatitis C test type - Dried blood spot (DBS) anti-HCV test
    HIV.G.DE41Hepatitis C virus RNA nucleic acid testHepatitis C test type - Hepatitis C virus RNA nucleic acid test
    HIV.G.DE42Hepatitis C virus core antigen (HCVcAg)Hepatitis C test type - Hepatitis C virus core antigen (HCVcAg)

name: HepatitisCtesttypeCodes
title: Hepatitis C test type Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Hepatitis C test type element

concept.display: Hepatitis C virus RNA nucleic acid test
